Uses of Class
org.github.terminological.jepidemic.growth.GrowthRateEstimator

  • Packages that use GrowthRateEstimator 
    Package Description
    org.github.terminological.jepidemic.growth  

    • Uses of GrowthRateEstimator in org.github.terminological.jepidemic.growth

      Methods in org.github.terminological.jepidemic.growth that return GrowthRateEstimator 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.basicGrowthRateEstimator​()
      Produces a GrowthRateEstimator that will estimate growth rate only, with sane defaults, and estimating using windows between 4 and 14 days
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.combineEstimatesWithWeightedMixture​()
      Sets the estimator to use a weighted mixture to combine estimates based on the length of different data windows, using weights defined by withEstimateWeighting() or withGaussianEstimateWeighting().
      protected GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.combineUsingOnlyFirstEstimate​()  
      static GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.defaultGrowthRateAndRtEstimator​(int minWindow, int maxWindow, double initialIncidence)
      Produces a GrowthRateEstimator that will estimate growth rate and $R_t$, with sane defaults.
      static GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.defaultGrowthRateEstimator​(int minWindow, int maxWindow)
      Produces a GrowthRateEstimator that will estimate growth rate only, with sane defaults, unless an infectivity profile is lated added
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateTimeseries.getEstimator​()  
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.priorIncidenceFromPosteriorAndGrowthRate​(double multiplyingSDby)
      Select a prior estimate for the poisson rate by taking the previous posterior and increasing it by the exponential previous posterior growth rate and multiplying the resulting disctribution by a constant factor.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.priorIncidenceFromPosteriorMean​()
      Select a prior estimate for the poisson rate by taking the previous posterior and constructing a prior with mean and sd both equal to the mean of the previous posterior.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.priorIncidenceFromPosteriorMeanAndCoefVariation​(double kappa)
      Select a prior estimate for the poisson rate by taking the previous posterior and constructing a prior with mean and sd both equal to the mean of the previous posterior.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.priorIncidenceFromPosteriorMeanAndGrowthRate​()
      Select a prior estimate for the poisson rate by taking the previous posterior and constructing a prior with mean and sd both equal to the mean of the previous posterior plus the growth rate.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.priorIncidenceFromPosteriorMeanAndGrowthRateAndCoefVariation​(double kappa)
      Select a prior estimate for the poisson rate by taking the previous posterior and constructing a prior with mean and sd both equal to the mean of the previous posterior plus the growth rate.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.priorIncidenceFromPreviousPosterior​(double multiplyingSDby)
      Select a prior estimate for the poisson rate by taking the previous posterior and multiplying the SD by a constant factor
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.priorIncidenceFromScaledPosteriorAndGrowthRate​()
      Select a prior estimate for the poisson rate by taking the previous posterior and increasing it by the exponential previous posterior growth rate and multiplying the resulting disctribution by a factor determined by the change in t-1 and t-2 indidence.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.priorIncidenceFromScaledPreviousPosterior​()
      Select a prior estimate for the poisson rate by taking the previous posterior and multiplying the SD by a factor determined by the difference between the t-1 and t-2 incidence.
      static GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.strictGrowthRateAndRtEstimator​(int minWindow, int maxWindow, uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RNumericArray infectivityProfiles)
      Produces a GrowthRateEstimator that will estimate growth rate and $R_t$, with sane defaults.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.useAllPosteriorEstimates​()
      The posterior estimates for each combination of data window and infectivity profile are all retained and combined
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.usePosteriorEstimatesFromOneWindow​(int tau)
      The posterior estimates for only one data window, but all infectivity profiles, are retained and combined.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.usePosteriorEstimatesWithEnoughData​(int sumIncidence)
      The posterior estimates for data windows that include a reasonable amount of data are retained and combined.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.withEstimateWeighting​(uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RNumericVector weights)
      Allows configuration of the weighting of estimate combination for the weighted mixture combination.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.withGaussianEstimateWeighting​(double meanTau, double sdTau)
      Allows configuration of the weighting of estimate combination for the weighted mixture combination.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.withInfectivityProfile​(uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RNumericVector infectivityProfile, boolean replace)
      Configure the estimator with an infectivity profile.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.withInfectivityProfileMatrix​(uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RNumericArray infectivityProfiles)
      Configure the estimator with an infectivity profile by specifying it as a matrix.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.withInitialIncidence​(double incidence)
      Allows configuration of the initial incidence.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.withOutputQuantiles​(uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RNumericVector quantiles)
      Allows you to change the quantiles returned by the estimator.
      GrowthRateEstimator GrowthRateEstimator.withSaneDefaults​()
      Provides a sensible baseline configuration for the estimator that involves estimating the poisson rate using the previous timestep's posterior and growth rate estimates.
      Constructors in org.github.terminological.jepidemic.growth with parameters of type GrowthRateEstimator 
      Constructor Description
      GrowthRateTimeseries​(GrowthRateEstimator estimator)
